name: New Myspace Light (White)
description: A light theme for New Myspace. (Updates Uncertain, PM with problems.)
additional_info:
(Update 9/11/16)
*Additional changes for improved overall contrast.

(Update 9/6/16)
*Update for myspace naming changes.

(Update 7/12/16)
*A few updates for site changes.

(Update 5/4/16)
*Fixed a few pre-login bugs.
*Re-aligned chat.

(Update 8/3/14)
*Cleaned up Discover Videos.

(Update 7/23/14)
*Radio discover search box changed to better match default.
*Featured article tweaks.

(Update 7/15/14)
*Fixed radio discover search box.

(Update 7/03/14)
*More button work.

(Update 7/01/14)
*Re-added filters.

(Update 6/28/14)
*Continued work to fix various buttons.

(Update 6/23/14)
*Fixed a few top fan issues. 'maybe'

(Update 6/19/14)
*Fixed some of the button colors.

(Update 6/12/14)
*Additional tweaks due to Myspace styles changing.

(Update 5/28/14)
*Tweaked for new "unified Sidebar"

(Update 5/20/14)
*Fixed footer after Myspace update.

(Update 4/14/14)
*Removed Featured Artist

(Update 9/24/13)
*Updated live stream page.
*Updated with portfolio page support.

(Update 9/10/13)
*Misc additions.

(Update 9/8/13)
*Changed font to black.
*Condensed some styles/added some notes.
*Small tweaks and fixes.
*Added some settings pages styling.
